sourcesContent:
/** * Advanced trading settings component with gas estimation, smart slippage, and batch configuration */ import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Settings, Zap, Target, TrendingUp, Clock, AlertTriangle, Info } from 'lucide-react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/card'; import { Button } from './ui/button'; import { Input } from './ui/input'; import { Label } from './ui/label'; import { Switch } from './ui/switch'; import { Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue } from './ui/select'; import { Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, TabsTrigger } from './ui/tabs'; import { Badge } from './ui/badge'; import { HelpTooltip } from './HelpTooltip'; import { SnipeConfig } from '../types/trading'; import { useAdvancedTrading } from '../hooks/useAdvancedTrading'; interface AdvancedSettingsProps { config: SnipeConfig; onUpdate: (updates: Partial) => void; } export function AdvancedSettings({ config, onUpdate }: AdvancedSettingsProps) { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const { gasEstimations, slippageCalculations, networkStats, estimateGas, calculateSmartSlippage } = useAdvancedTrading(); const gasEstimation = gasEstimations.get(config.tokenAddress); const slippageCalc = slippageCalculations.get(config.tokenAddress); const handleGasSettingsChange = (field: string, value: any) => { onUpdate({ gasSettings: { ...config.gasSettings, [field]: value, }, }); }; const handleSlippageSettingsChange = (field: string, value: any) => { onUpdate({ slippageSettings: { ...config.slippageSettings, [field]: value, }, }); }; const handleAutoSellChange = (field: string, value: any) => { const currentAutoSell = config.autoSell || { enabled: false, profitTarget: 50, stopLoss: 20, trailingStop: { enabled: false, percentage: 5, activationPrice: 10 }, partialSelling: { enabled: false, percentages: [25, 50], priceTargets: [20, 50] } }; onUpdate({ autoSell: { ...currentAutoSell, [field]: value, }, }); }; const handleBatchSettingsChange = (field: string, value: any) => { onUpdate({ batchSettings: { ...config.batchSettings, [field]: value, }, }); }; const getCongestionColor = (congestion: string) => { switch (congestion) { case 'low': return 'text-green-400'; case 'medium': return 'text-yellow-400'; case 'high': return 'text-red-400'; default: return 'text-slate-400'; } }; if (!isOpen) { return ( ); } return (
Advanced Trading Settings
Gas & Timing Smart Slippage Exit Strategy Batch Trading
Network Status
{networkStats.networkCongestion.toUpperCase()} Base: {networkStats.baseFee.toFixed(1)} GWEI
handleGasSettingsChange('maxGasPrice', parseFloat(e.target.value))} className="bg-slate-800 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="GWEI" />
handleGasSettingsChange('priorityFee', parseFloat(e.target.value))} className="bg-slate-800 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="GWEI" />
handleGasSettingsChange('executionTimeout', parseInt(e.target.value))} className="bg-slate-800 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="Seconds" />
handleGasSettingsChange('retryCount', parseInt(e.target.value))} className="bg-slate-800 border-slate-600 text-white" />
{gasEstimation && (
Current Estimation
Est. Cost:
{gasEstimation.estimatedCost.toFixed(6)} ETH
Est. Time:
{gasEstimation.executionTime}s
)}
handleSlippageSettingsChange('baseSlippage', parseFloat(e.target.value))} className="bg-slate-800 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="%" />
handleSlippageSettingsChange('maxSlippage', parseFloat(e.target.value))} className="bg-slate-800 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="%" />
handleSlippageSettingsChange('volatilityMultiplier', parseFloat(e.target.value))} className="bg-slate-800 border-slate-600 text-white" />
{slippageCalc && (
Smart Slippage Calculation
Recommended:
{slippageCalc.recommendedSlippage.toFixed(2)}%
Confidence:
{(slippageCalc.confidence * 100).toFixed(0)}%
)}
handleAutoSellChange('enabled', checked)} />
{config.autoSell?.enabled && ( <>
handleAutoSellChange('profitTarget', parseFloat(e.target.value))} className="bg-slate-800 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="%" />
handleAutoSellChange('stopLoss', parseFloat(e.target.value))} className="bg-slate-800 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="%" />
handleAutoSellChange('trailingStop', { enabled: checked, percentage: config.autoSell?.trailingStop?.percentage || 5, activationPrice: config.autoSell?.trailingStop?.activationPrice || 10 }) } />
{config.autoSell?.trailingStop?.enabled && (
handleAutoSellChange('trailingStop', { enabled: config.autoSell?.trailingStop?.enabled || false, percentage: parseFloat(e.target.value), activationPrice: config.autoSell?.trailingStop?.activationPrice || 10 }) } className="bg-slate-700 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="%" />
handleAutoSellChange('trailingStop', { enabled: config.autoSell?.trailingStop?.enabled || false, percentage: config.autoSell?.trailingStop?.percentage || 5, activationPrice: parseFloat(e.target.value) }) } className="bg-slate-700 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="% profit" />
)}
handleAutoSellChange('partialSelling', { enabled: checked, percentages: config.autoSell?.partialSelling?.percentages || [25, 50], priceTargets: config.autoSell?.partialSelling?.priceTargets || [20, 50] }) } />
{config.autoSell?.partialSelling?.enabled && (
Sell 25% at 20% profit, 50% at 50% profit
Advanced partial selling configuration coming soon
)}
)}
handleBatchSettingsChange('enabled', checked)} />
{config.batchSettings.enabled && ( <>
handleBatchSettingsChange('maxBatchSize', parseInt(e.target.value))} className="bg-slate-800 border-slate-600 text-white" />
handleBatchSettingsChange('batchDelay', parseInt(e.target.value))} className="bg-slate-800 border-slate-600 text-white" placeholder="ms" />
handleBatchSettingsChange('priority', parseInt(e.target.value))} className="bg-slate-800 border-slate-600 text-white" />
Batch Performance
Success Rate:
94%
Avg Time:
2.3s
Gas Saved:
12%
)}
); }
